author: Dana Eisenberg
title: Watch Jimmy Kimmel Surprise a Bus Full of Fans By Bringing Them to the Oscars | Mediaite
text:
Watch Jimmy Kimmel Surprise a Bus Full of Fans By Bringing Them to the Oscars by Dana Eisenberg | 10:31 pm, February 26th, 2017 
Jimmy Kimmel just made a bunch of regular people’s nights when he surprised them by bringing them to the Oscars. The group was on a tour bus, and they were told that they were going to an exhibit about Oscar dresses. And, as Kimmel pointed out, it wasn’t a total lie, as they were going to see a lot of dresses from the awards show. But, the dresses were going to be on actual live people, and they were going to be at the actual show. 
As the group approached the theater, Kimmel turned the lights off, and when the group walked in, the audience shouted, “Mahershala!” The tourists were introduced to celebs including Ryan Gosling , Nicole Kidman , Mahershala Ali , whose Oscar they got to touch, and Jennifer Aniston , who gave a fan her sunglasses. Denzel Washington even performed a “ceremony” for an engaged couple. 
Watch the video above for the entire surprise. 
[featured image via screen grab]
